text: short buf [ SIZE ] [ SIZE ] ; int main ( int argc , char const * argv [ ] ) { int n , t , max , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; buf [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = buf [ 0 ] [ 1 ] = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; ++ i ) { buf [ i ] [ 0 ] = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; ++ j ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ( buf [ i ] [ j ] ) ) ; buf [ i ] [ j ] += MAX ( buf [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] , buf [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; } } max = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; ++ i ) { max = MAX ( max , buf [ t ] [ i ] ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
